items.title: Making a Raycast Wallpaper
items.summary: Here's our 6 step guide on how you can make your own Raycast wallpaper for your desktop (or even your mobile and tablet).

items.title: No code reviews by default
items.summary: How we built an engineering culture based on trust that allows us to move incredibly fast without requiring code reviews.

items.title: Getting started with script commands
items.summary: Raycast lets you put productivity ahead of your development processes and workflows.

items.title: Be obsessed with feedback, not metrics
items.summary: Instead of relying heavily on analytics, we collaborate with our community and read every piece of feedback to figure out what to build next. Here is what we've learned so far.

items.title: Monthly focus documents instead of roadmaps
items.summary: As an early-stage company you have to move fast and stay flexible to be successful. Focus documents are a lean way to balance execution and planning of product teams.

items.title: Inputs for Script Commands
items.summary: Make your Script Commands more flexible with typed arguments.

items.title: Automate your Mac with Swift
items.summary: Write Script Commands in Swift to trigger every-day tasks from Raycast.

items.title: Hello World
items.summary: Announcing our public beta, seed round and developer program.
